metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9087 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HotelDruid before v2.3.1 has SQL Injection via the /tab_tariffe.php numtariffa1 parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

hoteldruid - 2.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.2-1').
